Radical 064: 手 扌

拘

拘薩羅國 (Skt. ; Pali ) translit. Kauśala. Lit. country of Kauśala, 國 is added for clarity.
Usage: 佛在拘薩羅國人間遊行
“The Buddha was in Kauśala touring among the people.”
cf. DA 7, 26, and 29.1.
